fz-s.title: Yamaha FZ‑S
fz-s.subtitle: Comfort‑oriented streetbike • 149cc • Fuel‑injected
fz-s.description: The Yamaha FZ‑S delivers a relaxed, confidence‑inspiring ride with economical performance for daily commuting.

yamaha-mt15-v2.title: Yamaha MT-15 V2
yamaha-mt15-v2.subtitle: Streetfighter styling • 155cc • 6-speed
yamaha-mt15-v2.description: The MT-15 V2 blends aggressive styling with a torquey 155cc engine and modern features.
